channel.title: New natural action: defend from convert
channel.description:
I think that some nights, u just don't want to be converted. It's make sense that you can just defend yourself, losing your action for the night.
It can also improve bad guys claims: I just defended myself today so no logs.
It's anoying as hell that you put all your effort for Blue Dragon and then, you are the first target for convertion
Wizard doen't help, because he is not garanteed, and he is mostly dead or converted very fast...

item.title: New natural action: defend from convert
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
You didn’t even read what I was trying to say. The Unseen and Cult do not need a nerf for the following reasons.

  • The classes they have are hugely balanced and there is no need for changing them right now

  • If they can’t convert people, or there is a defend against converting, whats the point of it?

  • Just because there is a good win rate for Unseen/Cult doesn’t mean they need a nerf.

  • There should only be a couple cases where converting shouldn’t be defending against

  1. Prince, as you would be a screwed if you didn’t jail anybody
  2. Magical Barrier as converting is a negative thing

It’s really dumb to have everyone be able to defend from converts. It’s part of the damn game.
